html:
New Delhi

New Delhi, Jan. 17 -- Apple iPhone 12 is selling at Rs.53,999 on Amazon India website. The ongoing Amazon Great Republic Day Sale is live today which will continue till January 20 midnight. The e-commerce portal is offering the 64GB iPhone 12 in the Black colour for Rs.11,901 less. Originally priced at Rs.65,900 on the Amazon India website, the year 2020 launched iPhone 12 saw a huge price drop and is now available for just Rs.53,999. Samsung Galaxy S21 FE which was introduced to India last week is available for Rs.49,999.

The Apple iPhone 12 mini in the Blue colour is retailing at Rs.49,999 for the 64GB version. OnePlus 9R in the Carbon Black and Lake Blue theme is available for Rs.36,999 for the 8GB/128GB variant.

The Samsung Galaxy M52 5G is selling at Rs.21,999. Redmi Note 11T 5G is available for Rs.14,749. The OnePlus Nord CE 5G is selling for Rs.24,999. Nord 2 is retailing at Rs.29,999 on Amazon's website.

Meanwhile, thApple iPhone 12 features a 6.1 inch Retina display and A14 Bionic chipset. Launched with iOS 14 last year, it was later upgraded to iOS 15.

iPhone 12 sports dual rear cameras at the back having 12MP+12MP resolution. The phone has a 12MP selfie camera as well. Published by HT Digital Content Services with permission from MINT.
